original_text: Then she gave the king 120 talents of gold, large quantities of spices, and precious stones. There had never been such spices as those the queen of Sheba gave to King Solomon.
korean_text: 이에 그가 금 백이십 달란트와 매우 많은 향품과 보석을 왕께 드렸으니 스바 여왕이 솔로몬 왕께 드린 향품 같은 것이 전에는 없었더라

sentences.original_text: Then she gave the king 120 talents of gold
There had never been such spices
as those the queen of Sheba gave to King Solomon
sentences.korean_translation: 스바 여왕이 솔로몬 왕에게 준 것과 같은 향료는
